restaurants.name: Centro Taco Bar
restaurants.description: Centro Taco Bar offers a vibrant atmosphere with a menu focused on fresh, made-to-order tacos and other Mexican delights. It's a local favorite for both dine-in and takeout, perfect for a quick and delicious meal.

restaurants.name: Cabo Fish Taco
restaurants.description: Cabo Fish Taco specializes in fresh seafood tacos, blending coastal flavors with a casual dining experience. The laid-back vibe and outdoor seating make it an ideal spot for enjoying a sunny day.

restaurants.name: PK's Pizza
restaurants.description: PK's Pizza is renowned for its late-night slices and hearty pizzas, making it a popular choice among students. With a welcoming atmosphere, it’s the perfect spot for grabbing a quick bite after a night out.

restaurants.name: Sharkey's
restaurants.description: Sharkey's offers a diverse menu featuring burgers, sandwiches, and seafood in a lively bar setting. Known for its friendly service and vibrant nightlife, it's a great place to unwind with friends.

restaurants.name: Gaucho Brazilian Grille
restaurants.description: Gaucho Brazilian Grille presents an authentic Brazilian dining experience with its rodizio-style service and a variety of grilled meats. The upscale atmosphere makes it perfect for special occasions or a memorable night out.

restaurants.name: Souvlaki
restaurants.description: Souvlaki is a charming eatery specializing in Greek cuisine, particularly its namesake dish, skewered meats grilled to perfection. The cozy atmosphere and flavorful dishes make it a must-try for lovers of Mediterranean fare.

restaurants.name: Hello Bagel
restaurants.description: Hello Bagel offers a delightful selection of fresh bagels, spreads, and breakfast sandwiches, perfect for a quick and satisfying meal. Its friendly service and relaxed vibe make it a favorite among students and locals alike.

restaurants.name: El Bronco Mexican Bar & Grill
restaurants.description: El Bronco Mexican Bar & Grill features a vibrant atmosphere and a menu filled with traditional Mexican dishes and drinks. Known for its lively ambiance, it's a great place to enjoy a festive night out.

restaurants.name: Dude's Drive In
restaurants.description: Dude's Drive In serves classic American fare, including burgers and milkshakes, in a nostalgic drive-in setting. It's a fun spot to relive retro dining while enjoying delicious comfort food.

restaurants.name: Himalayan Curry Cafe
restaurants.description: Himalayan Curry Cafe specializes in flavorful and aromatic dishes from the Himalayan region, with an emphasis on fresh ingredients and spices. The welcoming atmosphere makes it a great choice for a casual dining experience.

restaurants.name: Green's Grill & Sushi
restaurants.description: Green's Grill & Sushi offers a fusion of fresh sushi and grilled dishes in a modern setting. It's well-loved for its quality ingredients and diverse menu, perfect for both sushi enthusiasts and grill lovers.

restaurants.name: Mellow Mushroom
restaurants.description: Mellow Mushroom is a laid-back pizza joint offering creative pizzas, craft beers, and a colorful, artistic atmosphere. It’s a go-to spot for students and locals alike, especially for casual nights out with friends.
